rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody:
Dum complerentur dies pentecostes erant omnes pariter
dicentes discentes alleluia et subito factus est sonus de caelo alleluia tamquam spiritus torrens replevit totam domum alleluia alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D Hyd

verses.vBody:
Repleti sunt omnes
spiritu sancto spiritus sancto et coeperunt loqui

Dum ergo essent discipuli
in unum congregati congregati in unum propter metum Judaeorum sonus repente de caelo venit
super eos super eum

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
